title: It’s Not Love
summary: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...

title: Ghost Romance
summary: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

title: I Adopted a Male Lead From a Prison Shelter
summary:
In a universe ripped from the pages of a story, Siena Robert, a self-aware villainess, strives to rewrite her fate. Daughter of a man running a therianthrope shelter, she discovers Ivan Levdilin, the captivating male lead, detained within. Aware of her scripted demise when Ivan's father arrives for his rescue, Siena defies her villainous destiny. She showers Ivan with kindness, a stark contrast to the original Siena's cruel persona. Her actions shield Ivan from her father's cruelty and forge an unscripted bond between them that changes their destiny in an unforeseen direction. 

---
She possessed Sienna Lovett, the villain of the tragic novel. The greatest leader of the Tigers in the original novel when his Tiger Clan abandoned him for being a mutant, but that didn’t last long before the Duke came looking for his son. I’ve convinced my father to let him live with us somehow, but now I just need to succeed in protecting Ivan until the Duke comes… But when the Duke arrives, the unexpected happens. “I’ll take she too.” huh? I? Do I really want to continue living with my father?

title: Wake up, Jeon Seung Yeon
summary:
Seung-yeon is popular because of her pretty face, tall stature, and unique aura, and she works at a cafe, where she gets cheap self-esteem from male customers who show her favor.

Now in her senior year, Seung-yeon knows she should focus on her studies, but she can't quit her job at the cafe easily...
She meets the charming Lee Beom...
___
### Links
* [Alternative Raw](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11589552)

title: I Have the Dragon’s Heart
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Monday to Weekend
summary:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"

title: Hiding a Logistics Center in The Apocalypse
summary: Imagine you are stuck inside a warehouse while the world is experiencing an apocalypse. That’s exactly what’s happening to Jeong-gyeom, except he suddenly awakens a very odd but powerful ability to store anything in a parallel dimension, giving him the tools to defeat the creatures wreaking havoc on the world. But as he ventures into the ravaged city of Seoul, he realizes there is more to this apocalypse than meets the eye as he encounters other survivors and mysterious monsters on his quest to find his family.

title: The Strongest Hero with Negative Destructive Power
summary:
Decades have passed since the world became flooded with monsters. The protagonist, who enrolled in an academy to train those with aptitude, consistently ranked last in ability tests. It would have been one thing if his abilities were merely low, but because he also inflicted a debuff (ability reduction) on his surrounding comrades, he was called “unwanted” and a “burden.”

One day, while exploring, the protagonist is swallowed by a different dimension and goes missing. There, he encounters a creature from another world and is told the true value of his ability. Originally, magical power is something used to attack by projecting one’s own power outwards. However, the protagonist’s characteristic is the complete opposite of this “output”; it is “input” (absorption), and the ability to suck in external power is his true strength… “Reverse Magic Circuit.” The reason he had been debuffing his allies until now was that he had been unknowingly absorbing their power.

Having learned the true worth of his power, the protagonist now absorbs monster attacks to nullify them and gathers external power to strengthen himself, mastering his abilities and proceeding on the path to becoming the strongest.

title: End of the Show Window
summary: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...

title: Records of the Demonic Path’s Return
summary:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)

title: My Exclusive Tower Guide
summary:
15 days until the apocalypse happens. 

That's what Hoyeong Lee, a 29-year-old office worker, learns when he takes the mysterious medicine he got for saving a goblin from a bear trap. As it turns out, it allows him to level up more easily and provides him with a strategy guide! 

Everyone in the world is forced into groups to conquer the mysterious Apocalypse Tower, and Hoyeong has to find a way to work with his teammates so that everyone makes it to the top alive. 

Will his ability give him an advantage, or will it end up spelling out his doom?

title: Unrequited Love Defense
summary:
There are times in our youth that are awkward, messy, and unforgettable that stay with us forever. In the heart of adolescence, this is the story of first love. 

Mingyu has quietly loved his childhood friend, Jiwoo, for as long as he can remember.
Every time she laughs, complains, or casually drifts closer, his feelings deepen slowly but surely. The problem? Jiwoo has always had a thing for a very specific type: big, muscular "beast-like" guys. That's the total opposite of Mingyu. Thankfully, she’s never seriously liked anyone in real life so Mingyu has stayed in his role as the dependable “guy friend,” standing loyally by her side. But one calm autumn day, his peaceful world is shattered. “Joo Mingyu… I think I’m in love.” Out of the blue, Jiwoo falls head over heels for Kang Taemin, the captain of the school volleyball team. Now faced with the terrifying possibility that this might be her first real love, Mingyu realizes: it’s do-or-die. Determined not to lose her, he sets out on a last-ditch mission to become her ideal type… even if it means becoming a swole “muscular man” overnight!

title: One hit teacher master baek
summary:
Once the finest instructor in the Blood Cult, Suryong Baek is killed, only to to wake up in the body of someone who teaches martial arts at a small rural academy. 

His new body may be weak, but he knows how to fix it, and it’s not the first time that he’s found himself in a body that can’t access its inner power. 

Curing his body requires money, however, and Suryong decides that becoming the greatest instructor at a top academy is the best way to do it. 

Since he’ll be up against tough competition, Suryong will have to use everything he’s got to become a teaching superstar.

---
**Original Webtoon:**  
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=779632)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6698881)

**Official Translations:**  
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/best-teacher-baek/list?title_no=4153)
- [S.Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jueshimingshibaishifu/list?title_no=2011)
- [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/best-teacher-baek/list?title_no=4557)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/dingjianmingshi/list?title_no=4181)
- [Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001959)

title: Artifact-Devouring Player
summary:
Sanghyeon has the uncanny ability to absorb powers of magical artifacts — by devouring them. But it took him thirty years to master, and at fifty-five, it’s too late to escape mediocrity. 

Then one day, he’s miraculously sent back in time to the fateful day he awakened his powers as a monster-hunting player. 

With a chance for a do-over, he wastes no time using his ability to its full potential, rapidly absorbing incredible powers and rising through the ranks, determined to become the hero he always dreamed of being.

title: Boundless Necromancer
summary:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!

title: Please Leave Emily Alone
summary: Emily Addisio, with her acceptance letter in hand, enters the academe, featuring of a happy academy life, but she suddenly gets into an accident. Ethan Valenti, who accidentally helped her, gradationally becomes attracted to Emily, and Emily also feels shocked by his aggressive style. Before Emily could feel a strange sense of relief, he seized the window hedge with his right hand, which reached up to his midriff, and fluently jumped inside the structure. ” What?” In a moment, a dark shadow fell on Emily, who was amazed by the unforeseen narrow distance. That was because Lord Valenti, who is higher than her, was looking at her with his reverse leaning against the window. And as the shadow girdled her, Emily artificially tried to step back. But before she could move, Valenti reached out to snare the handkerchief she was holding.” Thank you, Emily. That was kind of you, but you did not have to return it.” The beautiful romantic story of Emily, which is ordinary but always girdled by extraordinary situations, and Ethan, who gave her his first and last love.

title: Till Divorce Do Us Part!
summary: Carl van Hellsing has vowed to hunt down the vampire Elliot for eternity. But, that's exactly what Elliot wants.

title: I Am Being Chased by My Husband
summary:
Proposed to my lifelong nemesis? A dangerous romance of chasing and deceiving between a scheming woman and a prickly man, based on Yuna Jin's original work. Elise, the Empire's most wanted criminal, dreams of a new life after leaving her dark past behind, only to receive a terminal diagnosis. The only solution is to obtain the "Stone of Time," owned by Duke Johannes—the man who's been chasing her all her life.

Screw it. Can't she just hide her identity?

"Love at first sight, Duke! Marry me!"

Can Elise successfully hide her identity and secure the Stone of Time?

---
My husband is hot on my trail! 

Eloise, a fugitive with a dark past, and Lord Johannes, the temple’s relentless hound, enter a marriage built on lies. With one year to live, Eloise must steal the Stone of Time from Johannes without revealing her identity. Can she survive this deadly game of deception?

title: Absolute Necromancer
summary:
Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!

title: Insanely-Talented Player
summary:
Six years ago, humanity was almost brought to an end when mysterious towers filled the skies across the globe, unleashing deadly monsters. Fortunately, the people known as Players emerged, blessed with supernatural powers that they harnessed to save mankind. 

Among them is Yuseong Kang, a phenomenal player who has saved the world time after time. Once again, he has successfully averted global catastrophe… and in an internationally broadcasted interview praising his heroic endeavors, he says, “I’m just in it for the money.”

title: Marriage Situation
summary: Kim Yooyoung is sick of playing the nice, boring lawyer and daughter. So when her overbearing mother books her a hotel room the night before an arranged blind date, she steps out of character and spends the night with a seductive stranger from the hotel bar. Only this stranger turns out to be none other than Cha Jihoon, her blind date and the hotel's high-class owner! Yooyoung will do anything to keep their "bad deed" a secret... but can she really marry her first one-night stand?

title: The Grim Reaper Duke’s Obsessive Contract Mother
summary:
Killed by her own husband, the prince, Lady Amelie wakes up one year before her doomed marriage. Determined to change her fate, she proposes a contract marriage to Duke Gazelle Isaac—infamously known as the “Grim Reaper.”

His only condition?

She must bond with his emotionally scarred twins.

Surrounded by secrets and shadows, can Amelie rewrite destiny—for herself and the feared duke?

title: The Stone Thrown in the Lake
Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
summary:
One of the Six Divine Clans of the Heavenly Demon Sect, the great heir of the Majin Jin Clan, Jin Yeomyeong.
Grateful for being born with a golden spoon in my mouth, I just wanted to enjoy a sweet life...
But damn that Murim Alliance — they destroyed the Heavenly Demon Sect.

And in the final moments of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yura says to me:
“Would you seduce me?”

title: If You Want a Cheeky Sorceress
summary:
“I’m sorry, I’m sorry, Princess.”
The friend who killed my family.
“I know that you were very kind to me. I know that you cared for me very much. But what can I do?”
He branded me with the slave’s brand on his shoulder and cried.
“I wish you could die without smelling Adelia’s scent. That’s my wish.”
I, who had lost everything, also wanted to die like that.
I was put in a small box and sold, and on my way, I was saved by a man like a tiger who came with flames.
“Yes, Princess. Chew my fingers. Eat and swallow something to at least put up with my damned ridicule. Put your nails in my face.”
Why are you trying to save me when you saved me?
“I kissed these lips. This neck. These arms and legs, the tips of my toes. I rubbed my body without leaving a single one out.” Why do I, who couldn’t protect even one family member, react to your flame?

A woman who wanted to die met a man who wanted to save her, and decided to live.
With only one goal in mind: to pull the legs of those who pushed her into hell, and roll through the fires of hell together.

title: Couple, How Far You Can Go?
summary: “If it’s okay with you, Noona… Do you want to do that thing I just saw with me?” Eunpyeong finds it difficult to start dating because of painful memories. Nyuk, her underclassman from the same department, approaches her but Eunpyeong finds it hard to accept him. One day, Nyuk walks Eunpyeong home because she is drunk. At her house, he makes an unexpected discovery and a bold suggestion…

title: The Blackened Second Male Lead’s Wife Series
summary:
Lucian Kardien. He was the hero who led the war to victory. He was the second male lead who loved the female lead so much that he turned yandere. And I’m the fiancée who will be killed by his hand.

Of all things, why did I have to transmigrate here! I must somehow increase his likability to prevent a “surprise” ending. With a toothy grin and my clapping hands of approval, I’ll help him connect with the female lead! But what is this reaction?

“Lady Pernia… please don’t provoke me anymore.”

…Why is it still a scary ending!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%9D%91%ED%99%94%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EC%84%9C%EB%B8%8C-%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EB%82%B4%EB%9E%8D%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3567), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62102395)

title: Becoming the Obsessive Male Lead’s Ex-Wife
summary: A struggling part-timer suddenly collapses at work and wakes up in the famous novel "Pervin and Stella" as the villainess Irwyne Liliath. To make matters worse, Irwyne's fate in the story is grim as she's condemned to execution for attempting to poison Pervin, the male lead and a highly respected duke. Desperate to survive, Irwyne is determined to win Pervin's heart. But as she grows closer to him, his feelings evolve in unexpected ways. Irwyne now faces an uncertain fate that wasn't written in the novel's pages. Will she be able to rewrite her destiny?

title: Bloody Marriage
summary:
Scarlett was a happy girl. With beautiful looks, a wealthy family, and even a kind fiancé, Scarlett was expected to be the most beautiful bride in the world. But on the morning of her wedding day, the pure-white bride was killed by someone. When she opened her eyes again, everything was different.   
  
"I've told you many times before. It's because I'm Scarlett Antwerp!"   
  
"I'm sorry, but the Esteemed Daughter of the Count, Lady Entwerp, is already dead."   
  
Waking up in a strange place, Scarlett could not understand what had happened to her. Why couldn't anyone recognize her? Why was her fiancé standing next to another woman? Why was she Vivian instead of Scarlett, the Esteemed Daughter of the Count? Why was the one next to her not her fiancé Edward, but Alexis, the police chief? Scarlett swore that she'd get her fiancé back and get revenge on the one who killed her.

title: Food Truck Owner Inside the Dungeon
summary:
"Don't yearn for a world different from yours, just live a normal life."

Hunters, dungeons, I'm not interested in any of them.
My life followed one single path that's of cooking.
But the moment I was about to open my first long-awaited food truck....

[Class: You have awakened as a Food Truck Owner (Hidden)!]
[Item: Dungeon Business Permit (Personal/Non-Transferable)!]
- Business is only possible inside the dungeon

Min Jiun, 21 years old, awakened as the owner of a food truck inside the dungeon.

title: The Child of Sin is the Beloved Bride of the Ice Lion
This Reincarnated Countess Is Trying to Escape From Her Prince
An Extra In The Family Is The First To Be Abandoned
summary:
I am the youngest princess yet I was discarded by my own family in the Imperial Palace at the age of ten. The Imperial family then lost their power and was caught in the flames of rebellion, and I was the first to be abandoned. Alone, cold and hungry, I lived on the streets until a kind couple took me in and I became Ethel, a commoner. Stella the princess was no more.

Now, after 10 years, I have to return to the Imperial palace where I was abandoned, because my "family" wanted to see me.

“I need a replacement,” my sister, the first princess, told me, “You'll replace my missing sister.”

Of course, they don't even recognize that I am the real missing sister, since they never looked at me anyway.

“That’s a tempting offer, but I don’t want it, princess.”

“Are you sure you want to turn down my offer?”

Her threat is so clear, but I might as well have my revenge and return the palace to play the role of my own substitute. I will humiliate these people who don’t recognize me, I will never forgive them. They'll try to win the heart of their princess who has awakened her powers, but this time I'll be the one to abandon them.

“In the end, I’ll be happy.”

The splendid return of the abandoned princess.

---
With the entire Belvice Empire awaiting her abilities, Princess Stella’s life is turned upside down when she fails to bring the stars into the sky. Discarded by her family as the empire is overthrown, she is taken in and raised by commoners. But when the empire is restored and her conceited sister finds her, Stella’s peaceful life is threatened once again. Is she doomed to live as a puppet for the family that hated her? Or can she shatter their demands and rise as the true leader of Belvice?

title: I Raised an Obsessive Servant
summary:
After being reborn as a desolate fire witch and villain destined to die a tragic death, Chersinia creates a plan to avoid her fate by gambling at a casino to become a wealthy recluse. 

The only problem? She somehow ends up with a slave boy named Ben instead of the money she needs! 

But much to her surprise, she starts to warm up to Ben, who provides the perfect joy and comfort in her lonely life. Little does she know that Ben has a dark secret that will change her life forever...

title: Love Under the Full Moon
summary: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!

title: The Diligent Villainess Gets Her Revenge In This Life
Don’t Pay Attention to The Villainess
The DUKE who fell into darkness dotes on The VILLAINESS
True Love of Mr. Wonderful
summary: Gong Jiu, a valkyrie of the apocalyptic era, transmigrated into the body of the white rose of the entertainment industry who was hated by many. On the day she arrived in the world, she unexpectedly saved the life of the cold King of the SIlver Screen, Bo Yibai! The cool and strong Alpha, straight actress X The cold, arrogant yet quiet Adonis of the masses. The two of them co-starred in a drama and went onto variety shows together as the arrival of Gong Jiu brought about a wave of interesting events in the boring entertainment industry! After Gong Jiu and Bo Yibai’s relationship was made public, the audience would always scream, “Help! The wife of the King of the SIlver Screen is ruining the variety show!”

title: The Grim Reaper Young Lady Wants To Save Her Mastermind Older Brother
The Substitute Adopted Daughter is Finally Free!
Virus King
summary: When the apocalypse descends, the world transforms into a brutal game of evolution—humanity’s final trial, and the favorite playground of gods and demons. Brian Carter time-travels back to ten days before it all begins. Armed with foreknowledge and no time to waste, he injects himself with the zombie virus and awakens a legendary SSS ability: Virus Monarch! Now, with the power to command infection itself, Brian forges a terrifying new path through the chaos, one where he doesn’t just survive the end of the world, but rules it!
